thread.title: M Split Corp.: Monthly Dividend Declared for Class I Preferred Shares

author: cnbc.com
title: M Split Corp.: Monthly Dividend Declared for Class I Preferred Shares
text:
TORONTO, April 18, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- M Split Corp. ("M Split") declares its monthly distribution of $0.03125 per share ($0.375 annually) for Class I Preferred shareholders. The Class I Preferred share dividends are paid at an annual rate of 7.50% based on the $5 notional issue price. Distributions are payable May 10, 2018 to shareholders on record as at April 30, 2018.
M Split invests in common shares of Manulife Financial Corporation, the largest life insurer in Canada offering financial products and wealth management services.
Distribution Details Class I Preferred Share (XMF.PR.B) $0.03125 Ex-Dividend Date: April 27, 2018 Record Date: April 30, 2018 Payable Date: May 10, 2018 Investor Relations: 1-877-478-2372
Local: 416-304-4443
www.m-split.com
info@quadravest.com
Source:M Split Corp.
